body: Hi Claudio, Check the attached file for the WIP component. I ran couple of test cases and the result looks fine but the results still should to be validated. Also it will only work for IES files with rectangle surfaces. Do you have any elliptical examples? You can also read IES2RAD manual page: ([http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/ies2rad.1.html](http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/ies2rad.1.html)) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1ygck9z1r4D3oHJG36**5IXp9gIR*hJQLfe626RPMonUeODLbU4kTpHD3xzU9CbYgpp7Ju3L*TaoRknRuwGM73ZjiZe2UPxf/IES2HB_2_Perspective.png) Let me know how it goes. Mostapha
